column4: anybody knows the answer to the following question: I bought a laptop. Installed linux on it. I want to return to seller (bestbuy in my case). On the original receipt it is said that I can return item within 14 days since purchase. So, will the fact that I have linux installed on the machine create any problems for me?
What does that have to do with ubuntu?
I don't think we can help you with that. You have to ask the people you'll be returning it to
